content: Hello Purple. We are happy to see that you are engaging in trade agreements with White. As I'm sure you know by now, we have also formed an alliance with Pink! This means that we are now able to communicate more easily between our two nations and can work together towards a stronger future for both of our countries.
Hi White! We have formed an alliance with Pink and are very happy about this development! We would like to work together on issues of trade between our two nations.

Hello Pink! We are very happy to hear that you have joined us as part of our alliance! As I'm sure you know by now, we are allies with Purple and White as well. This means that we can work together towards a stronger future for both of our countries!
We are ready to respond to anyone who seeks peace with us.
Thank you for staying allied with us during this trying time. We will help you defend against Yellow.
We do not have enough nuclear weapons. We are ready for peace.
